dict.acceptation: 蒸汽，雾；〈口〉精神，精力；轮船，乘轮船旅行；
动力；成蒸汽上升；汽动；[非正式]发怒；

sent.orig: Wow, it's nice to relax and let off some steam after a long week at work.
sent.trans: 就是啊，放松一下，感觉真好！Larry,你说要letoffsteam?Steam是蒸气，你还会放气呀？

sent.orig: When water is heated to 100 degrees Celsius, it boils and becomes steam.
sent.trans: 水加热(heat)到100摄氏度时，沸腾(boil)变成水蒸气(steam)。

sent.orig: Use of your Steam account is your responsibility.
sent.trans: 使用你的STEAM账户是你的责任。

sent.orig: Overheating in high-temperature high-pressure steam pipelines and equipment, should choose an exclusive steam traps steam.
sent.trans: 在高温高压过热蒸汽管线和设备上，应该选用过热蒸汽专用。

sent.orig: Steam pipe should be drawn on top of the boiler, where steam comes out.
sent.trans: 蒸汽管道应该画在锅炉顶部，蒸汽从那个位置出来。
